About Us:

Reckless Records is a group of three record stores in Chicago IL. We carry new & used CDs, DVDs games and loads of Vinyl. Originally started in London, our first Chicago location opened in 1988. (LPs & 7"s). We would love to have you visit us in person.

We are always looking to buy your unwanted CDs, DVDs, and vinyl. Please get in touch if you are interested in selling your collections. We buy at all locations every day up to an hour before closing time.

You can also visit:
              The Reckless Blog

We still have a shop in London too! They are located in Soho at:
30 Berwick Street
London W1F 8RH
Reckless Records London

ARCADE FIRE
NEON BIBLE (2LP)
MERGE
Named after JOHN KENNEDY TOOLE's novel, "Neon Bible," this sophmore full-length is full of surprises & string arrangements. WIN BUTLER's vocals this album have a changed into something a little "Boss" influenced. Some of the writting style is a bit BRUCE SPRINGSTEEN inspired. The strongest point of this album is the collective cohesiveness & clear vision that the band has seemed to maintain throughout all the hype the album (and tour scheduling) has been receiving. Amazing organ orchestrations, string scapes, & flexibility and complexity of the vocals is impressive. There still are "classic" rock elements to the album. Although lacking the full-force inspiration of a momentous loss (as on "Funeral") it is still truthful & real. ARCADE FIRE deliver again, & will be in it for the long haul. Do yourself a favor & check this out. APPROVED. The vinyl version of "Neon Bible" comes with a coupon to download the entire album free!
Available at: Milwaukee Ave.
Used LP( Very Good Condition ) $12.99
ARCTIC FLOWERS
REVERIES (COLOR VINYL)
INIMICAL
2011 full length from Portland's ARCTIC FLOWERS (with members of THE OBSERVERS & SIGNAL LOST). Captivating & melodic, "Reveries" is gonna be stuck in your head for days on end. Dark, yet upbeat, punk with slight anarcho/OI influences popping in here & there. Strong Female vocals. One of the best punk records you will hear this year. On INIMICAL and... H I G H L Y R E C O M M E N D E D !!!
Available at: Milwaukee Ave.
Used LP( Near Mint Condition ) $7.99

AU REVOIR SIMONE
MOVE IN SPECTRUMS (PINK VINYL) (LTD. EDITION W/ DOWNLOAD)
Instant
80's influenced synth pop is all the rage right now with CHROMATICS, GLASS CANDY, GRIMES & PURITY RING moving tons of units & groups like PET SHOP BOYS, DEPECHE MODE & OMD releasing new albums & seeing late career surges. AU REVOIR SIMONE is closer to the above mentioned contemporaries for sure with nods towards THE KNIFE, Italians Do It Better bands, etc... Limited edition pink vinyl.
Available at: Broadway
New LP $14.99
B-52s
ROCK LOBSTER (IMP, 4TRKS)
ISLAND
Available at: Broadway
Used LP( Good Condition ) $4.99
BANHART, DEVANDRA
REJOICING IN THE HANDS (2LPS, ORIGINAL) NINO ROJO
YOUNGGOD
Jesus Christmas, YOUNG GOD certainly took their time putting these out on vinyl, but the wait is over. "Nino Rojo" & "Rejoicing the Hands" were released seperately on cd but they were actually recorded during the same session, so this "two-fer" release actually makes sense. The gatefold includes exclusive artwork, & the vinyl features two spoken word tracks by SWANS/ANGELS OF LIGHT/ YOUNG GOD RECORDS brain-genius MICHAEL GIRA. ???
Available at: Milwaukee Ave.
Used LP( Very Good Condition ) $19.99
